mapper.select: select t.target_id,t.target_name,os.options_content,os.options_id,os.options_weight from paperstarget pts left join target t on pts.target_id=t.target_id left join targetoptions tps on tps.target_id=t.target_id left join options os on os.options_id=tps.options_id where pts.papers_id=#{papers_id}

select sum(os.options_weight*pst.target_allweight) as fraction from options os left join targetoptions tos on os.options_id=tos.options_id left join target t on t.target_id=tos.target_id left join paperstarget pst on pst.target_id=t.target_id where os.options_id=#{options_id} and pst.target_id=#{target_id}
